homepage.title: As steadfast as a bull, defending Taiwan's future!
homepage.subtitle:
I am Dou Lihan, upholding justice and seeking harmony.
Hoping to shape a better tomorrow together with humanity.
homepage.donateSubtitle:
Your small donation
is a big source of motivation for the future of every furry friend!
homepage.donateTotal: The current total amount of small donations:987,655,873
homepage.selfIntroductionOne: I believe enhancing dog welfare and related policies can contribute to Taiwan's future. Dog therapy improves health, boosts work enthusiasm, stimulates the economy, and benefits GDP.
homepage.selfIntroductionTwo: Hence, I aim to promote legislative policies ensuring the well-being of both dogs and humans. Safeguarding Taiwan's happiness starts with caring for dogs!
